name: Grave Servitude
originalText:
You may choose to play Grave Servitude as an instant; if you do, bury it at end of turn.
Enchanted creature gets +3/-1 and is black.

rulings.text: The color change lasts only while this card is on the creature.
The sacrifice occurs only if you cast it using its own ability. If you cast it using some other effect (for instance, if it gained flash from Vedalken Orrery), then it won’t be sacrificed.

text:
